description: This pork and rosemary cottage pie is rich and delicious with parmesan mash on top.
name: Pork & Rosemary Cottage Pie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium onions, peeled and finely sliced
0.25 bunch rosemary, leaves picked and finely chopped
1.6 cup chicken stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large, nonstick pan on medium heat and cook the onions and pork mince for 6-8 minutes, stirring. Stir in the garlic and rosemary cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in the wine and bubble for 1 minute. Stir in the chopped tomatoes and simmer for 34 minutes. Add the stock and partially cover with the lid. Cook for 15 minutes until reduced.
Preheat the oven to 180Â°C. Cook the potatoes in a large pot of boiling water for 8-10 minutes, until tender. Drain well, mash and stir in the creme fraiche and parmesan.
Pour the pork mince into an ovenproof dish, smooth the mash on top and bake for 30 minutes, until golden and bubbling.
